properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND STATUS ='Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , R.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID, COUNT, CATEGORY_NAME, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "CREATE_DATE" FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) JOIN CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND BOARD_TYPE=1 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) R ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 11 AND 25;
